Container.Name: jupyterlab
Container.Overview: JupyterLab is a web-based interactive development environment for Jupyter notebooks, code, and data. [br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Links[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]Repository:[/b] https://github.com/jupyterlab/jupyterlab[br] [b]Wiki:[/b] https://jupyterlab.readthedocs.io/en/stable/[br] [b]Docker:[/b] https://hub.docker.com/repository/docker/bgameiro/arch-jupyterlab[br] [br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/opt/app/data[/b] Where JupyterLab should store the Notebooks[br] [br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Set Up[/span][/u][/b][br] The logs contain a token needed for first login[br] Support for other languages will be added. For now, there is only the basic JupyterLab with Python and Markdown.[br]
